ComicInfo.Summary:
Ben and Brooks go out on a successful smash-and-dash supply run only to come back to their home fortress and find...two girls?!? Is this the beginning of the end for the boys and their way of life? Forget zombies, this might be the real threat... Experience the zombie apocalypse from a kid’s point of view...and see why people are calling KIDZ Stranger Things meets Welcome to Zombieland on a Gorillaz soundtrack!
